entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
